title: Hinamatsuri (TV) (Hinamatsuri)
synopsis: While reveling in the successful clinching of a prized vase for his collection, Yoshifumi Nitta, a yakuza member, is rudely interrupted when a large, peculiar capsule suddenly materializes and falls on his head. He opens the capsule to reveal a young, blue-haired girl, who doesn't divulge anything about herself but her name—Hina—and the fact that she possesses immense powers. As if things couldn't get any worse, she loses control and unleashes an explosion if her powers remain unused. Faced with no other choice, Nitta finds himself becoming her caregiver.
voices: ['Tanaka, Takako', 'Nakajima, Yoshiki', 'Hondo, Kaede', 'Murakawa, Rie', 'Ozawa, Ari', 'Tsuji, Shinpachi', 'Hikasa, Youko', 'Kawanishi, Kengo', 'Inada, Tetsu', 'Koyama, Tsuyoshi']
staff: [['Oikawa, Kei', ['Director', ' Storyboard']], ['Motoyama, Satoshi', ['Sound Director']], ['Nawa, Munenori', ['Episode Director']], ['Oochi, Keiichirou', ['Script', ' Series Composition']]]
